ygData.subject: Re: Slam vs. Bash
ygData.msgSnippet: A good point here Vashi.  I also find that the speed of two scims with a kick is QUITE effective at interrupting an enemy caster...BUT I dont know how that
ygData.messageBody:
A good point here Vashi. I also find that the speed of two scims with a
kick is QUITE effective at interrupting an enemy caster...BUT I dont know
how that compares to a high bash skill.

Is there a tower shield in the game? i.e. the Roman type shield??

My RL friends and I are planning to switch servers when a new one comes up
(because I double there levels and they dont seem to be catching up :) Ill
be starting a human warrior on the new server for a few reasons -

1) There pretty rare compared to the specialist warrior races (Ogres, barbs
and trolls
2) +25% xp bonus coupled with the lowest xp table (quick acceleration).
3) Human males look TERRIBLE in leather and chain, but look quite impressive
in plate mail.

Anyway, I think a human warrior in full plate with a tower shield will look
quite impressive. What is the weight of a full set of bronze vs. black Iron
vs. normal plate? thanks.

> ----------
> From: schlaban yocksovik[SMTP:anonymaste@...]
> Reply To: warriors_eq@onelist.com
> Sent: Tuesday, May 18, 1999 10:30 PM
> To: warriors_eq@onelist.com
> Subject: Re: [warriors_eq] Slam vs. Bash
>
> From: "schlaban yocksovik" <anonymaste@...>
>
> hmm waste of time learning bash cus you get dual wield?
> I have to dissagree with you big time.
> The sole purpose of a higher level warrior is not being able to dualwield
> and smack the enemy with loads of damage.
> Thats the casters job, warriors are tanks and should have rockin armor and
> a
> shield for protection and to bash with to stunn and interupt casters IMHO.
> Sure dualwield is _realy_ good and thats a skill to keep maxed too, it
> rocks
> on easier mobs, but when the s#&t hits the fan that bash and shield ac
> might
> be the thing saving your teams but.
>
> ps
> I dont want to start a flame war, just my oppinion.
> ds
>
> vashi
> >From: Kyle Buffington <KBuffington@...>
> >
> >Slam is what the larger races get and Bash is what the smaller races get
> >with a shield.
> >If you are a warrior like me then you are wasting your time with bash if
> >you
> >are going to dual wield when you hit level 15.
> >I am not positive if it is a waste of time with a Barbarian.
> >that is my understanding into bash and slam.
> >
